meanings.definition: The quality or state of being aromatic.
meanings.sent1: The aromaticities of the flowers filled the room with a pleasant smell.
meanings.sent2: The aromaticities of the spices enhanced the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent3: The aromaticities of the perfume were so strong that it attracted bees!
meanings.sent4: The aromaticities of the coffee wafted through the air like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The aromaticities of the bakery made it impossible to resist buying a treat.

meanings.definition: The presence of aromatic compounds in a substance.
meanings.sent1: The aromaticities in the essential oils provided a calming effect.
meanings.sent2: The aromaticities in the wine gave it a rich and complex taste.
meanings.sent3: The aromaticities in the air freshener made the room smell like a forest.
meanings.sent4: The aromaticities in the garden were like a symphony of scents.
meanings.sent5: The aromaticities in the soap made the shower experience luxurious.
